description: With experience at all levels of Federal Government contracting and broad experience in working with the top Federal, State and Local Government service...

With experience ranging from holding senior level positions in the Office of Personnel Management, Department of Defense, and Capitol Hill, they are experienced in the issues that you confront and the government hiring process...

As market conditions have changed, Private Equity has become a greater part of our firmâ€™s practice. We understand the talents and skills required to lead companies through all the stages of their life cycle...
